Uses of Class
org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.federation.router.RemoteLocationContext

  • Packages that use RemoteLocationContext 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.federation.resolver
    The resolver package contains indepedent data resolvers used in HDFS federation.
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.federation.router
    The router package includes the core services for a HDFS federation router.
